text: Indeed, with hardship comes ease.
He is with you wherever you are.
Patience is the key to relief.
Hearts find rest in God's remembrance.
Gratitude turns little into enough.
Trust Allah, He never fails.
Sabr and Shukr — balance of life.
When Allah is your reason, you never quit.
Pray more, worry less.
Light upon light.
This world is but a moment — prepare for eternity.
Silence is worship when words fail.
Let go. Let God.
Tawakkul: peace in trusting Allah.
He hears the unspoken prayers of your heart.
The more you remember Allah, the more peace fills your heart.
Don’t lose hope in Allah’s mercy — it’s greater than your sins.
Even your silent patience is heard by Allah.
Every test brings you closer to the One who sent it.
Raise your hands in dua, and your burdens will fall away.
When Allah delays, He is preparing something better.
Faith is not about seeing, it’s about trusting the unseen.
The world is temporary — aim for what lasts forever.
He knows what’s in your heart even when you can’t express it.
When hearts are heavy, remember Who created them.
A single sincere prayer can change the course of your life.
The one who trusts Allah never truly feels alone.
Darkness fades when you walk toward His light.
Your worth isn’t in this world’s eyes, but in Allah’s sight.
Behind every ‘why me?’ is a hidden ‘trust Me.’
